mapper.insert: INSERT INTO story ( member_id, content, created_at, status ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{content}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'ACTIVE' )
mapper.select: SELECT s.*, m.name, m.profile_picture_url FROM story s JOIN member m ON s.member_id = m.id WHERE s.status = 'ACTIVE' AND s.expires_at > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ORDER BY s.created_at DESC
SELECT s.*, m.name, m.profile_picture_url FROM story s JOIN member m ON s.member_id = m.id WHERE s.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY s.created_at DESC

SELECT s.*, m.name, m.profile_picture_url FROM story s JOIN member m ON s.member_id = m.id WHERE s.member_id = #{memberId} AND s.created_at >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '24 hours' ORDER BY s.created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE story SET status = 'PRIVATE' WHERE expires_at <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AND status = 'ACTIVE'
